Name: PXL-SHIP
About the game: PXL-SHIP Is a high score game! Survive the asteroid field as long as possible and try to defeat the destroyer! upgrade your ship and unlock different styles! Rank up to unlock different ship skins. Rank up to earn upgrade blocks to spend on ship upgrades! Defeat the boss to earn 1000 points! Collect crystals from destroyed asteroids to use special weapons. Complete in game Achievements! Get the highest score you can!
Meta Title: PXL-SHIP: May 4, 2020, Joshua Bergstrom and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on PXL-SHIP? Check out the release date (May 4, 2020), developer insights from Joshua Bergstrom, and a complete game summary.
